ItemDescription.Value:
English below. 可配置的战场小地图。 Configurable battle mini map.
存档兼容性： 这个mod不会向存档读写任何东西，放心随时启用随时卸载。
使用指南： 按M可开关地图和切换地图模式。 长按alt可临时开关地图。 地图缩放会随人物移动速度变化而变化。 在场景中按L键可打开配置菜单。
Save compatibility: This mod won't read/write anything from/into your save, so you can feel free to enable or uninstall this mod at any time.
Usage: Press M to toggle map visibility and map mode. Hold ALT to temporarily toggle map visibility. The map scale will change with player's movement speed. Press L to open config menu during battles.
links： Nexusmods: https://www.nexusmods.com/mountandblade2bannerlord/mods/2672
